programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Disgraced Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry must escape an outer space prison to stop a dangerous threat in town.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the investigation into a missing teen leads the detectives to a severed leg, they are drawn into the world of self-mutilation and ritual amputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the detectives investigate reports of sexual abuse at an elite private school, decades of secrets are exposed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Holiday celebrations are interrupted when Detective Tutuola's ex-brother-in-law is arrested for attacking a priest; during the investigation, a church scandal is uncovered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a rape victim is arrested for murder in Suffolk County, Detective Benson questions the case and finds enough evidence for District Attorney Barba to charge a different suspect in Manhattan.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry must escape an outer space prison to stop a dangerous threat in town.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 7-year-old girl escapes from her rapist, detectives Benson and Stabler begin an intensive search for the predator.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The murder of a software company employee leads Benson and Stabler to a fired co-worker who may have a horrifying motive for the slaying.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for the sadist who tortured a senile old woman (Jane Powell), investigating her nursing home, as well as her scheming son (Jay Thomas).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a boy and his abusive guardian leads the detectives to a travel agency specializing in exotic trips for sexual predators.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for a suspect with an ax to grind when an engagement party ends in a quadruple homicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives discover that the body of a young woman, found murdered in her apartment, is that of a lawyer who secretly moonlights as a stripper.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young boy is abandoned, the squad discovers more victims waiting to be rescued.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a starving toddler is found wandering the streets, detectives are led to a home where another child is in grave condition; Chief Dodds (Peter Gallagher) suggests that Benson's squad may be undergoing changes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for a missing teenager takes an emotional toll on Dodds; DNA evidence could lead to the teen's abductor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The powerful family behind a retail empire defends one of its own from a bartender's rape accusation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A top-level investment banker accuses her billionaire client of rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An airline pilot accuses her captain of sexual assault; Fin makes sure Benson is protected at work.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl taken from her mother at the U.S.-Mexico border ends up in a sex-trafficking ring in New York, and Benson and Stone fight to reunite the girl with her mother; Rollins confesses to her ex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial rapist strikes again after two decades of silence, and SVU is determined to uncover the elusive criminal and bring justice to his many victims; Stone discovers that his father worked on the case before it went cold.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The case of a teenage girl assaulted in the projects leads to a startling discovery; Benson puts her trust in someone from her past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson walks into a hostage situation at a neighborhood restaurant; Rollins tries to help her father after he's hospitalized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A home invasion and kidnapping lead the SVU to a shocking discovery; Muncy tries to fit in with the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: FBI Agent Dana Lewis partners with SVU when she thinks a 25-year-old rape-murder case in New York is connected to multiple unsolved cases across the country; as Lewis doggedly pursues her suspect, Benson and Amaro question his guilt.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 7-year-old girl escapes from her rapist, detectives Benson and Stabler begin an intensive search for the predator.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The murder of a software company employee leads Benson and Stabler to a fired co-worker who may have a horrifying motive for the slaying.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for a suspect with an ax to grind when an engagement party ends in a quadruple homicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young boy is abandoned, the squad discovers more victims waiting to be rescued.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a starving toddler is found wandering the streets, detectives are led to a home where another child is in grave condition; Chief Dodds (Peter Gallagher) suggests that Benson's squad may be undergoing changes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a janitor violently attacks a coach, the SVU team connects the janitor's behavior to a history of sexual abuse; the detectives find more victims of the same predator -- including a prisoner (Mike Tyson) on death row.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: FBI Agent Dana Lewis partners with SVU when she thinks a 25-year-old rape-murder case in New York is connected to multiple unsolved cases across the country; as Lewis doggedly pursues her suspect, Benson and Amaro question his guilt.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU squad tries to keep Detective Rollins' sister safe from her abusive boyfriend when she turns up beaten and pregnant; when Rollins is forced to take drastic action, an internal affairs investigation begins.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the SVU detectives investigate the alleged rape of a sorority pledge, drunken students and conflicting accounts complicate matters.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When two sniper attacks on the NYPD link to Detective Tutuola's past as a narcotics officer, he reconnects with his former partner in hope of finding a motive; Lt. Alexandra Eames helps SVU investigate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into how a comatose woman ended up in a river near the mayor's home reveals the victim's unexpected wild side.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives uncover a shocking theory as they work to learn the identity of a man Rollins arrested for exposing himself in the park; Detective Benson finds herself in mortal danger.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU squad searches for Detective Benson and her abductor (Pablo Schreiber).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Investigation into the suspected rape of a woman Benson helped earlier leads to a cybermogul; the team bids farewell to Sgt. Munch.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Detective Benson faces Lewis in the courtroom, the stress causes setbacks in her recovery; Benson is forced to reveal secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a suspect is gravely injured and the case becomes a public spectacle, Amaro's badge is on the line; Cragen surprises everyone with an announcement.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a teen uses a rifle to stop an assault on his mother, he learns the perpetrator of the assault is someone he knows.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation of a congressman falsely accused of soliciting underage girls leads the SVU to a sex trafficking ring; Benson and Rollins are the targets of a salacious website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a young woman is raped by a member of her church group, Barba argues that the First Amendment doesn't entitle a person to break the law.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a crucial witness in the case of a fatal hate crime against a Muslim family is deported, Barba must drop the charges against a suspect, resulting in rising tensions between communities on either side of the case.

programme.title: Live: NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Cup Series heads to the Rust Belt for the Firekeepers Casino 400. The race was moved to June this year after holding an August time slot since its inception in 1969. Ryan Blaney prevailed last week in Nashville, and won this event in 2021.
